content: Sohel decided to propose to propose to Fabliha at the very spot where they previously fell in love with each other. She was under the impression that they were doing a photoshoot with a close friend of Sohel's. Little did Fabliha know that her best friend would be there to capture the moment on film.
Sohel graduated his master program and celebrated the day with Fabliha after the official ceremony.
